nodes.text: The Jedi Temple's training gallery was a training room in the Jedi Temple used by the Jedi Order. Between 29 BBY and 22 BBY, Padawan Anakin Skywalker was tasked with training against Marksman-H training remotes in the gallery with only a wooden training sword. Instead, he used the Force to grab the lightsaber of his master, Obi-Wan Kenobi, to use against the remotes.
